description: This Python script fetches an audio file from a URL, uses an AI agent to analyze the audio and generate responses, and saves the response audio to files. It orchestrates interactions with the agent, handles audio data, and manages file operations.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An AI agent that interacts with OpenAI models to process audio and text.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model configuration for OpenAI chat with audio and text modalities.

classes.name: RunResponse
classes.description: Represents the response from the agent, including audio data.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response, optionally with audio.
